official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to simplify certain reporting requirements imposed on persons seeking to acquire control of an insured bank.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to permit a person seeking to acquire control of an insured bank who has previously filed a notice pursuant to such Act and submitted the required information to provide any material changes which are needed in order to update the information previously submitted.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to simplify certain reporting requirements imposed on persons seeking to acquire control of an insured bank.
